column1: {attacker} throws a bucket of bees at {boss}! It stings for {damage} HP! ({hp_left}/{hp_max})
{attacker} bonks {boss} with the ban‑hammer, dealing {damage} damage! ({hp_left}/{hp_max})
{attacker} reminds {boss} to hydrate. It’s super‑effective: {damage} HP lost! ({hp_left}/{hp_max})
